name: Ext_R5_DocumentReference_author
title: Cross-version Extension for R5.DocumentReference.author for use in FHIR R4B
description: This cross-version extension represents DocumentReference.author from http://hl7.org/fhir/StructureDefinition/DocumentReference|5.0.0 for use in FHIR R4B.

element.short: Who and/or what authored the document
element.definition: Identifies who is responsible for adding the information to the document.
element.comment: `DocumentReference.author` maps to R4B `DocumentReference.author`. Type `Reference(http://hl7.org/fhir/StructureDefinition/CareTeam)` has no mapping So is mapped as SourceIsBroaderThanTarget. `DocumentReference.author` has no related element in R4B:Media
